name: QualifiedRoleType
title: QualifiedRoleType
description:
A code for the degree or educational rank that the credential specifies. May also apply to an Expertise type.

This resource is an informative value set; a [normative subset](https://tgateway.infoway-inforoute.ca/vs/qualifiedroletype) can be found on Canada Health Infoway's [Terminology Gateway](https://tgateway.infoway-inforoute.ca).
